trans-unit.source: Defines a method for adding the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments"></xref> part of the markup to an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] package.

For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments> element of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] package, see chapter 9 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=67000).
Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments"></xref> element to an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] package.

For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments> element of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] package, see chapter 9 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=67000).

An <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsStructure"></xref> that represents a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments"></xref> element in an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] package.
